title: TezMauiAid
description:
The recent fire in Maui have caused immense devastation. In an attempt to support relief efforts, the Tezos community has set up donation opportunities to recognised, independent relief organisations. Artists and collectors can contribute through art sales and promotion of this fundraiser. Direct donations of XTZ are also possible.
Artists, make sure to use TezMauiAid tag at mint time and to redirect proceeds to the donation wallet to be visible in this event page.
